# Get List

Retrieves a contact list in HubSpot Marketing.

# Untitled Section

# Configuration

List - Select the list from the drop-down list or enter a custom list
                        ID. You can retrieve the list ID from the output of an event trigger, a
                        Create list activity, or a List All Records → list (object) activity. This
                        field supports String type input.





* Lists - Automatically generated output variable.
